Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface Signaler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable, Named, PropertySheetHolder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSignaler, ActuatorSignaler, Neoden4Signaler, SoundSignaler
    public interface Signaler
extends Identifiable, Named, PropertySheetHolder
    A Signaler is capable of signaling certain machine or job states like errors or warnings.
